level_shortcut_info.text: You have a strong feeling that rectangular portals indicate levels that you are supposed to get something from.

L_HUB_jump.name: Sign
L_HUB_jump.text: Press up to interact with interactable objects.

L_HUB_jump.name: Sign
L_HUB_jump.text: Also, hold the jump button to jump higher.

L_HUB_controls.name: Sign
L_HUB_controls.text: You can adjust your controls in the options menu.

L_HUB_controls.name: Sign
L_HUB_controls.text: Unless, of course, you are satisfied with the defaults.

0_2_failed.name: Sign
0_2_failed.text: Congratulations, you have failed the puzzle.

0_2_completed.name: Sign
0_2_completed.text: Congratulations, you have completed the puzzle.

0_2_hintful.name: Sign
0_2_hintful.text: If you get stuck, you can access hints from the pause menu.

0_2_hintless.name: Sign
0_2_hintless.text: I would tell you about the hints in the pause menu, but it seems you don't need them.

0_5_undo.name: Sign
0_5_undo.text: Undo checkpoints are created when you land on the ground after collecting, or using, an ability.

1_HUB_reminder.name: Sign
1_HUB_reminder.text: Don't forget about the left side of the Forest.

1_4S_special.name: Sign
1_4S_special.text: Levels marked with an S are completely optional.

1_4S_special.name: Sign
1_4S_special.text:
They are remixes of existing levels,
usually with a much higher level of difficulty, both in puzzle solving, and execution.

1_4S_special.name: Sign
1_4S_special.text:
Don't feel bad for skipping them! 
You can always come back later.

3_5S_warning.name: Sign
3_5S_warning.text: You will never have to do this again.

6_HUB_campfire.name: Zoe
6_HUB_campfire.text: Though I feel my life regenerating faster, not complaining.

6_3_retake.name: Sign
6_3_retake.text: Remember to grab some water, this is a good place to do so.

H_B_wishlist.name: Sign
H_B_wishlist.text: Please wishlist the game if you enjoyed it!
